name: to_lower
description: Returns a new string representing the input string converted to lower case.

params.name: str
params.description: String expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`. The input can be a single- or multi-valued column or an expression.

params.name: str
params.description: String expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`. The input can be a single- or multi-valued column or an expression.

examples:
ROW message = "Some Text"
| EVAL message_lower = TO_LOWER(message)
